text: Hay miyamaratiyaya, mbaloy kano a manga tabanga o Allah: Izan o kiyatharoa o Eysa a wata o Maryam ko manga Hawariyyon a: "Antawaa i manga tabanga akn sii ko Allah?" Pitharo o manga Hawariyyon: "Skami i manga tabanga o Allah". Na miyaratiyaya so sabaad ko manga moriyataw o Israil, na miyongkir so sabaad. Na piyakabagr Ami so miyamaratiyaya, ko kizosogataan iran ko ridoay ran, na miyabaloy siran a miyamakadaag
